Articles.Content: i have added some more choices and this poll will help me know what people play =P

None of the above.
3 pure FPS\'s, a game that haven\'t been released yet and no KSP in the list? Very weird selection of options
Why did I get an email notification to this stupid thread?

noe of them, but its halo 3. in second is seek and destroy, third is call of duty: world at war, forth is call of duty modern warefare 2 (3 and 4 are basically a joint 3.5 they are so close in my op) 5 is borderlands, then new vegas, kerbal (sorry, i know its low, but the best game at the moment), killing floor, then BF3 and for the big 1-0 is star-wars: empire at war.

noe of them, but its halo 3. in second is seek and destroy, third is call of duty: world at war, forth is call of duty modern warefare 2 (3 and 4 are basically a joint 3.5 they are so close in my op) 5 is borderlands, then new vegas, kerbal (sorry, i know its low, but the best game at the moment), killing floor, then BF3 and for the big 1-0 is star-wars: empire at war.

I have Star Wars; EaW!

Although my brother lost the disc so I can\'t play it. ,_,

So what you\'re asking is: Do I like to play with Guns, Lego\'s, or Rockets?

Duh! ... Rockets!

My favorite game is the entire Unreal series, followed by Doom III, followed by KSP.

Ksp

Golden eye

Age of empires
KSP and CoD MW3 ftw!!!
Where\'s skyrim...
Favorite game? As in, of all time? Definitely Morrowind.

I have Star Wars; EaW!

Although my brother lost the disc so I can\'t play it. ,_,

Aww, i would have asked you for a game but i first played it on a dog slow dell inseron 2300 which had a pentium 4 at 2.4 Ghz, 512 kb ram, i was reapeatedly told off for making it crash, i was only 9, im now 15. jesus that was 6 YEARS ago! might digg up the ps2 just to buy seek and destroy again!

Kerbal Rulz!

however, the wait for 14 to finish up is KILLING me!
The only one on there decent enough for me to play is Kerbal Space Program. IL-2 1946 should be up there, along with skyrim.
